attributes.action: Give all England players a knighthood regardless of their next two results
attributes.background: The character shown by Gareth Southgate and the side has been inspiring. All the players deserve recognition

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
